post.author: 임기순

comment.author: 신민용
comment.content: can you put more details? I got the ticket 9 years ago. ( I was running 180Km in 80Km limit highway ) I had to pay $400.

comment.author: 최덕선
comment.content: I would not recommend agencies unless they are really good. Don't believe "not solved, it's free." I had really bad experience with them and I could understand how they do business. Call me home.

comment.author: jameslee
comment.content: $107 will have lower priority. They will do $400 ticket rather than $107 one if they have to choose one.

post.content: I got a speeding ticket. Can anyone recommend an agency?
post.title: Can you recommend a Traffic Ticket Agency?
